article_title: Columbus Day: What's open, what's closed on Monday
article_text: Legally, zoning changes cannot affect any buildings already standing or under construction, so the proposal moving through Planning and Development Services would limit new buildings to balconies on the interior and no higher than the third story if on the exterior.

article_metadata.Description: Here's a quick list of what's open and what's not on Monday, Oct. 12 – Columbus Day. This is not a comprehensive list, and the best bet is always to call and verify whether an office is open before...
